item.title: [PI] Scroll being equipped when used
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

                    case 761:
                    itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
                    itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Teleport";
                    itemDef.name = "Market Scroll";
                    itemDef.description = "Teleports you to the Lumbridge Market.".getBytes();//examine.
                    break;

item.title: [PI] Scroll being equipped when used
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

When I try to click on the teleport scroll that I made, it just equips as a normal weapon.
The scroll’s code: if (itemId == 761) { c.getPA().movePlayer(3222, 3218, 0); c.startAnimation(582); }
In itemdef I changed the name and description. Here’s the code for that: case 761: itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Teleport"; itemDef.name = "Market Scroll"; itemDef.description = "Teleports you to the Lumbridge Market.".getBytes();//examine. break;

Read full topic
